mapper.select: select a.* from WF_TASK a left join WF_RU_INST_CONTENT b on a.proc_inst_id=b.proc_inst_id left join WF_RU_INST c on a.proc_inst_id=c.proc_inst_id where b.contentvalue=#{xmid}order by a.c_activityid desc

select a.* from wf_task_history a left join wf_hi_inst_content b on a.proc_inst_id=b.proc_inst_id left join wf_hi_inst c on a.proc_inst_id=c.proc_inst_id where b.contentvalue=#{xmid} order by a.c_activityid desc
select t.xmid,b.username,b.mobilephone lxfs,to_char(t.zdsj,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') zdsj_str from sfkp_sftzdzb t left join XTGL_USER b on t.zdr=b.userid where t.xmid=#{xmid} order by t.zdsj desc
